hint: Focus on safely pushing filters into CTEs, converting implicit joins to explicit joins, and decorrelating date subqueries by precomputing date ranges.
Isolate selective dimension filters (date, item) into separate CTEs, materialize them to break up large joins, and apply early aggregation where possible.
Pre-filter and materialize all dimension tables first, then restructure the query to process each sales channel separately before unioning to avoid repeated dimension joins.
Transform the query by decomposing the self-join pattern in the revenue CTE, using UNION to separate state conditions, and converting range filters to interval joins.
